title: Key issues for Southgate's England one year from World Cup

title: Strictly's Ayling-Ellis praised for deaf tribute dance

title: Band of Builders turns amputee Cher Little's house into a home

description: A fourth man is arrested after a taxi explodes outside a Liverpool hospital on Remembrance Sunday.

title: 'Robbed' South Africa seek World Cup qualifier replay after 'questionable decisions' in defeat by Ghana
description: South Africa are set to make a "formal complaint" about "questionable decisions" made by match officials in Sunday's 1-0 defeat by Ghana, says their football association chief.

title: Shell plans to move headquarters to the UK
description: The oil giant will shift its tax residence from the Netherlands to the UK and its boss will relocate.

description: Jermain Defoe will help lead Rangers' men's first team while the club pursues a successor for manager Steven Gerrard.

description: England bowler Adil Rashid is the third player to say he heard Michael Vaughan make a racist comment to a group of Asian cricketers.

title: COP26: How much is spent supporting fossil fuels and green energy?
description: Despite green energy investment promises, many governments still financially back the fossil fuel industry.

description: Some two million people are told to stay at home amid growing pressure on hospitals as cases surge.

title: Federer unlikely to play Australian Open, says coach Ljubicic

title: David Buick: the motoring pioneer who lost everything
description: Scottish-born car maker David Buick made two fortunes during his lifetime - and lost them both.

title: Maori tribe tells anti-vaccine protestors to stop using popular haka
description: The popular Ke Mata haka was performed by anti-vaccine protesters during demonstrations last week.

title: Astroworld: Boy, nine, dies days after crush at Travis Scott festival
description: Ezra Blount is the youngest of 10 people killed after panic broke out during rapper Travis Scott's show.

title: 'I had concerns about marriage', admits Malala Yousafzai
description: The Nobel laureate says she previously questioned marriage and the "imbalance of power".

title: Trump Organization selling Washington hotel for $375m, reports say

description: While other countries grapple with living with Covid, China is doubling down on stamping it out.
